relations.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections

name: NLS modification to ANSI/NISO Digital Talking Book specification to include AMR-WB+ Codec
description: Modification of DTB (NISO Digital Talking Book Standard, ANSI/NISO Z39.86-2002), to add the option to use AMR-WB+ compressed audio coding.
